name: check_in
description: Schema for storing daily health check-in data including mood, anxiety, pain, and fatigue levels
schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "check_ins"
(
    [id] INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL,
    [user_hash] VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    [timestamp] DATETIME NOT NULL,
    [checkinId] VARCHAR NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    [mood] VARCHAR,
    [health_comment] VARCHAR,
    [doctor_visit] BOOLEAN,
    [health_profile_update] BOOLEAN,
    [anxiety_level] REAL,
    [anxiety_details] VARCHAR,
    [pain_level] REAL,
    [pain_details] VARCHAR,
    [fatigue_level] REAL,
    [fatigue_details] VARCHAR
);
